insert into five_ed_arrange_timetable (arrange_id, send_major, receipt_major, receipt_time1, receipt_time2, receipt_time3, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, seq) values (#{arrangeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiptMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiptTime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiptTime2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiptTime3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update five_ed_arrange_timetable set arrange_id = #{arrangeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, send_major = #{sendMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_major = #{receiptMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_time1 = #{receiptTime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_time2 = #{receiptTime2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_time3 = #{receiptTime3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, arrange_id, send_major, receipt_major, receipt_time1, receipt_time2, receipt_time3, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, seq from five_ed_arrange_timetable where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
